title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2: An open-world western action-adventure game set in 1899 America.

title: Witcher 3 wild hunt
description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is a 2015 action role-playing game developed and published by CD Projekt. It is the sequel to The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings and the third game in The Witcher video game series, based on the book series of the same name by Andrzej Sapkowski.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is a 2020 action role-playing video game developed and published by CD Projekt. The game is set in the fictional Night City, California, in a dystopian future in which advanced technology coexists with widespread urban poverty and crime.

title: King of Fighters XV
description: KOF XV is set after the events of the previous game, and follows the characters as they compete in the King of Fighters tournament, which is being held this time to determine the best fighter in the world.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Forza Horizon 5: A breathtaking open-world racing game set in Mexico, featuring stunning landscapes, a vast car collection, and thrilling races.

title: Halo Infinite
description: Halo Infinite: The next chapter in the legendary Halo series, offering epic sci-fi battles, a gripping narrative, and Master Chief's return.

title: Fortnite Spider-Man
description: Spider-Man is a powerful and versatile fighter in Fortnite. He can use his web-shooters and Spider-Sense to outmaneuver his opponents and take them down with ease.

title: Diablo III
description: Diablo III is an action role-playing game (ARPG) developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment. Players battle demons in the dark fantasy world of Sanctuary.

title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends: A team-based, competitive MOBA where players control powerful champions to destroy their opponent's Nexus.

title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
description: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Iconic racing fun with beloved Nintendo characters, thrilling tracks, and exciting power-ups. Timeless multiplayer entertainment.

title: Dota II
description: Dota 2: A complex, strategic MOBA where players control unique heroes to destroy their opponent's Ancient.

title: God of war : ragnarok
description: God of War Ragnarok is the sequel to the critically acclaimed 2018 game God of War. It is the ninth main installment in the God of War series, and the third and final chapter in the Norse saga.

title: Alan Wake 2
description: Alan Wake II is a 2023 survival horror game developed by Remedy Entertainment and published by Epic Games Publishing. A sequel to Alan Wake, the story follows best-selling horror novelist Alan Wake, who has been trapped in an alternative dimension for 13 years, as he attempts to escape by writing a horror story involving an FBI agent named Saga Anderson.

title: Grand Theft Auto - V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the seventh main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series, following 2008's Grand Theft Auto IV, and the fifteenth instalment overall.

title: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring[a] is a 2022 action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware. It was directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki with worldbuilding provided by fantasy writer George R. R. Martin.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is a 2020 action role-playing video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the twelfth major installment in the Assassin's Creed series, and the successor to 2018's Assassin's Creed Odyssey.

title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human
description: Dying Light 2 Stay Human is a 2022 action role-playing game developed and published by Techland. The game is a sequel to Dying Light, and was released for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S on 4 February 2022.

title: Mass Effect 2
description: Mass Effect 2 is an action role-playing video game developed by BioWare and published by Electronic Arts for Microsoft Windows and Xbox 360 in 2010 and PlayStation 3 in 2011.

title: A Plague Tale: Requiem
description: A Plague Tale: Requiem is an action-adventure stealth game. The game is the sequel to A Plague Tale: Innocence (2019), and follows siblings Amicia and Hugo de Rune who must look for a cure to Hugo's blood disease in Southern France.

title: Far Cry 6
description: Far Cry 6 is a 2021 first-person shooter game developed by Ubisoft Toronto and published by Ubisoft. It is the sixth main installment in the Far Cry series and the successor to 2018's Far Cry 5.
